testcase.name: Bayernatlas shows a menu in Firefox for desktop usage
Bayernatlas shows a menu in Chromium for desktop usage
Bayernatlas shows a menu in Webkit for desktop usage
Bayernatlas shows a menu in Firefox for mobile usage
Bayernatlas shows a menu in Chromium for mobile usage
Bayernatlas shows a menu in Webkit for mobile usage
